content_parts.title: Features
content_parts._jql: project = XT AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R1 (24.0.0)") AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Common' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New

content_parts.content:
The tax setup for South Africa has been delivered for the following:

  • Tax codes
  • Tax values
  • Tax determination lines

 
On the sales invoice line the action 'Price search' has been changed to 'Search price'.

content_parts.title: Account page - isActive not respected in duplication

content_parts.content: When an inactive record is duplicated, the record resulting from the duplication is now also set to inactive.

content_parts.title: Purchase receipt | PO selection doesn't populate the receipt grid

content_parts.content: The purchase receipt lines grid is now populated correctly with the purchase order lines selected via the "Select from order" sidebar.

content_parts.title: Improvements
content_parts._jql: project = XT AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2023 R1 (24.0.0)") AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Manufacturing' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Manufacturing' AND status IN (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes))

content_parts.title: Stock count 5: adjustments through the new stock service

content_parts.content: A Stock adjustment is created when you post a stock count if a quantity variance exists between the counted quantity of an item and the stock quantity.
